common.tagline: Complete care for your furry friends

features.title: POWERFUL FEATURES
features.heading: A Feature for Every Pet Need
features.description: Our platform is packed with powerful features to help you provide the best possible care for your pets. From health records to reminders, we've got you covered.

petProfile.title: Complete Pet Profile
petProfile.description: A single place for all the important information about your pet, from medical history to dietary needs.

careReminders.title: Care Reminders
careReminders.description: Set up reminders for everything: vet appointments, medications, vaccinations, and more.

medicalHistory.title: Medical History
medicalHistory.description: Keep a detailed log of every medical event, including deworming, cleanings, and surgeries.

symptomTracking.title: Symptom Tracking
symptomTracking.description: Monitor your pet's health by logging symptoms and sharing the data with your veterinarian.

hero.title: The Most Attentive
hero.subtitle: Pet-Care Platform
hero.description: We know how much you and your pets care for each other. We are on a mission to take that relationship to a whole new level with 50+ exclusive features for your pets' every need.
hero.noCredit: No credit card required. Cancel anytime.
